page.title: 15CLUBS.
page.content: In the Newlyn area there is a great number of clubs to which we can join. They are Gwavas Youth Club open on Wednesdays and Saturday. Shell Group run by Trinity Chapel on Tuesday. Cross Keys Club run by St.Peters Church on Sunday evenings. Girls Friendly Society which meets on Mondays. The B.M.X. Club which stands for bicycle Moto cross has its race track in Newlyn Friday nights are training nights and race meetings are held on Sundays and on Bank holidays Alverton Athletica is a football club that plays in the junior football league in West Cornwall. There are three teams under 12 under14 and 16. Matches are played on Thursdays during the holidays and on Saturdays and Sundays. They train on our school pitch.
